overview:
OverviewThis extension lights up with a new notification count whenever you have new activity waiting for you at LinkedIn.Clicking on the extension's icon is also an easy way to take you directly to the LinkedIn website to view your new activity.

Privacy Policy: https://www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy

By installing this extension, you agree to LinkedIn's User Agreement at https://www.linkedin.com/legal/user-agreement

Please send any feedback to liextension-feedback@linkedin.com

reviews.reviewerName: The Kelley Group Brooke and Sarano Kelley
reviews.reviewText:
This service is extremely valuable and so so helpful. I really love this platform and the ease of use as it pops up the contact information for new potential customers that i look up on Linked In!
Love it and would definitely recommend it!

It's nice to know when you have messages or notifications, but not sure why the app opens a new page to https://www.linkedin.com/feed/ every time rather than going directly to https://www.linkedin.com/notifications/ or https://www.linkedin.com/messaging/ - Also, it would be nice if it would go to an existing open LinkedIn tab, if one is open, rather than opening a new one each time.

Nothing but just an icon to open LinkedIn, you can't see the notification through a dropdown box without opening the whole LinkedIn in new tab.
This extension doesn't no better than a bookmark. I was expecting something like reply a message from the extension.
I think it needs an update cause it no longer works. Showing a question mark all the time.
Perfect tool to get contacts.
Love being able to see my notifications off-platform. As a daily LinkedIn user, this ensures I don't miss any important updates or messages from my network.
Linkedin  website is very help full

For a very long time, it has worked like a dream. The last two days, it's showing that I have several notifications but there are NO notifications to access. I hope this message gets to the developer for troubleshooting. I've tried the suggested trouble shooting tips which work for a couple of hours and then it malfunctions again. Thanks for helping, please.
Does exactly what it says and is accurate. Even shows a grey question mark if you're not logged in.

The LinkedIn extension is very useful.

Most of the time, I consider my LinkedIn notifications and messages to be of higher importance and priority than those in my other email and messaging accounts. As such, I like to know about them as soon as possible.

Given that my screens are often filled with open applications, I just don't have the visual real estate available to leave LinkedIn open and visible all the time. However, I always have Chrome open, doing at least something with the browse... Show more
Great app, has helped a lot in keeping absolute control of my inmails, and really answering to anyone sending me in only a few minutes :D

overview:
OverviewBlock distracting LinkedIn feeds and news to focus on your professional growth and networking.Maximize your productivity on LinkedIn with LinkedIn Feed Blocker üåü, the premier Chrome extension for professionals and job seekers alike. Tailor your LinkedIn environment to suit your professional needs by eliminating distractions from feeds and news.

Key Features:
Eliminate LinkedIn Feeds üö´: Enhance your focus by removing the clutter of constant updates. Perfect for maintaining a distraction-free LinkedIn experience.
Block LinkedIn News üîï: Block out LinkedIn‚Äôs news to concentrate solely on networking and career opportunities.

User Support and Feedback:
Experiencing difficulties or have suggestions? I'm committed to continuous improvement and value your feedback üì¨. Reach out to me at darrentu.questions@gmail.com.

Join Our Developer Community:
Dive deeper into customization and contribute to feature enhancements by visiting my GitHub page üñ•Ô∏è: https://github.com/darrentu/Feed-Blocker-for-LinkedIn.

Why Choose LinkedIn Feed Blocker?
Designed with the professional user in mind, LinkedIn Feed Blocker helps you maintain a laser focus on your career goals by cutting down on non-essential content üéØ. Install today and redefine your professional browsing experience on LinkedIn!See more

overview:
OverviewWiza.co | Prospect, Verify, Reach OutFind real-time verified email addresses on LinkedIn for free.

Wiza‚Äôs free LinkedIn email finder allows you to view accurate work and personal email addresses in seconds while on LinkedIn profiles.

‚úî Find emails on LinkedIn profiles

Using the Wiza LinkedIn email finder, you‚Äôll be able to pull up real-time verified email addresses (both business and personal) on any LinkedIn profile that you view‚Äîin a matter of seconds.

‚úî Bulk export leads from LinkedIn Sales Navigator and LinkedIn Recruiter

Wiza‚Äôs LinkedIn email finder enables you to export your searches and saved lead lists in LinkedIn Sales Navigator with real-time verified email addresses (and phone numbers).

‚úî Save emails found on LinkedIn to lists and export to CSV

Download your saved lists and exports to CSV in a single click, including contact name, employer, job title, email addresses, phone numbers, and 30+ other data points.

‚úî Sync emails directly to your CRM and sales tools in one click

Connect Wiza to your CRM (HubSpot, Salesforce, and more) and then instantly sync contacts with email addresses to your platform with one click.

‚úî Our LinkedIn email finder is trusted by 50,000+ users including:

Sales teams to prospect and build pipeline
Founders to find their first and next customers
Agency owners to perform lead generation for clients
Marketers to reach out about collaboration and link builder
Recruiters to source candidates and acquire talent

Join Wiza today and get 25 free credits every month: https://wiza.co/auth/signup

We appreciate your support and please feel free to reach out to us with any questions or needs via our live website chat or at hello@wiza.comSee more

reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best LinkedIn prospecting chrome extension. The emails and phone numbers it gets are the most accurate and it's such a beautifully designed app and super easy to use. The free plan made this a no-brainer to get started when I just needed to find a few contacts, and then I immediately upgraded to the premium plan to get unlimited emails when it came time to do major outreach campaigns. I HIGHLY recommend it!
I've been using Wiza religiously for 2 months now and recommend it to anyone needing accurate emails. Easy to use, great product, and love how they continue to focus on quality features.

Absolute game-changing product for prospecting on LinkedIn. Email addresses (work and personal) are consistently the most accurate I've seen in having tested a handful of these types of tools. Great UI/UX and free monthly plan makes it a no-brainer.

I cant delete my account - so stay away waste of my time.
Hate when someone try to hide the delete - COME ON SHOW IT . dont hide it - NOW you force to write bad about your tools and my review will be here forever.
Useless, after login several times never worked.
I tried with my brother, and it creates the email based on his names and name company. Thanks good I checked the free trial.
Just what I'm looking for - need e-mail address and this program will supply
Fantastic extension! It has significantly streamlined my workflow by providing quick access to extensive contact information, saving me valuable time at work.
Great Product, has been a game-changer for acquiring contact info. The accuracy of contact info is exceptional and the UI is exceptional! üöÄ

Totally rubbish extension, it just randomly arrange the name with company and make it a fake email id, that look like genuine email. But that is wrong email. 

Fake email providing.

Wiza.com has been a game-changer for my lead generation efforts. The platform's user-friendly interface made setting up campaigns a breeze, and the email finder tool's speed and accuracy allowed me to build a high-quality lead list effortlessly. The exceptional customer support, coupled with a strong commitment to data privacy, further solidified my positive experience. Wiza.com not only streamlined my outreach efforts but also saved me valuable time. I highly recommend Wiza.com to anyone see... Show more

Wiza has been a game changer for me/my team. The accuracy of contact info saves so much time & so many headaches. The extension makes it super easy to use through LinkedIn + its not clunky compared to some others I've used

I'm a HUGE fan of Wiza! I've been using this tool for 2+ years & have recommended them to a ton of my Sales colleagues. It makes prospecting a breeze - the email data is super accurate & I love the LinkedIn widget. I can snag someone's email with one click :)

The perfect example of form over function. It looks good but cannot perform even a single action. It's pretty useless. Don't waste money on junk like this, please. The 100 positive ratings are most likely from employees who work at Wiza.
Not Free Credit available

This tool is great. The customer support is unmatched, there's someone available 24/7 whenever I have an issue. By far the most accurate contact data that I've gotten from any tool. Best part is they only charge when they actually give you a valid piece of data.

Very bad billing practice. The tool lets you trial for "free" from linkedin search navigator. However if your search has more than what your credit permits it will show you a warning that you should setup your billing. Without ever telling you that you will be charged nor how much it just charges you as soon as you add your credit card. I find this billing practices outrageous. Don't use this tool.
Exceptional product, particularly when you consider the data quality is higher while cost per lead is lower than most competitors
Amazing overall product & UI - makes sales prospecting a breeeeze!
Great product - works exactly as advertised and expected. Cheap too when you contrast pricing with competitors.

I have been in sales for over 20 years and have tried many email sourcing applications over the years. In my opinion, Wiza is hands down the best in terms of quality of contact details, consistently well over 80% for my searched. Also, the user experience is very easy and I get an excel spreadsheet of all the contact information. Well done Stephen and team.
Easy to use extension. Tried a range of competitors and Wiza comes back with the best & most reliable results. Has been brilliant for our business.

I'm a freelance new business consultant. Wiza is essential to my day-to-day prospecting on behalf of my clients. The product is really easy to use and way more affordable than its competitors. I would definitely recommend if you're in a sales, new business or business development role.
Good tool to collect contacts from Linkedin, expanding your database. Good for prospecting.
Wiza is a life-saver for our sales team. 10/10 - cannot fault it!
Super simple to use, with great results!
Super easy to use!

Wiza extension has been really useful
Excellent, does exactly what you need it to for a very reasonable price!

Have been using Wiza extension for the past few months and it has been very helpful to further enrich contacts.  Not only a time saver, but also helps us get data which otherwise would've been hard to get.

Wiza is a gamechanger! Never has lead generation become so easy and convenient and I am definitely targeting my desired audience and getting my message across more clearly and thus WINNING clients! Definitely recommend Wiza and its Chrome extension!
Brilliant tool, very easy to use and fairly priced. Been using it in conjunction with sales navigator to great effect.

its very accurate and a great resource

A great app experience and quite accurate. We love using it!
I absolutely love Wiza. It makes finding leads with LinkedIn Sales Nav seamless. Thank you!

Incredibly great tool. Works incredibly well with Linkedin. 

A must have for sales pros and founders.

I'm currently benchmarking Lusha with Wiza. Haven't sorted out how to get a perfect xls file from their CSVs (for LinkedIn Sales Nav search lists) but I'm in touch with one of the people at Wiza. It's just that many of my leads don't have an email address, not even on Lusha or Wiza, quite disappointing if you pay money for this.

I like this product.  Easy and effective!  There are a few features i would recommend...a list of domains NOT to get email scapes for but it can be done as a workaround with Sales Nav.  Price is decent too.

overview:
OverviewThe most powerful LinkedIn Automation tool for lead generation and recruitingHave you ever wanted an automation tool that doesn't just automate your recruiting process, but also imports new leads from more than just searches and lets you organize them all into a modern ATS and CRM?

What is Jobin.cloud:

Jobin.cloud is a SaaS platform catered to finding and contacting the right people with integrated automation, ATS, CRM and lead generation technologies for both your contacts and accounts; we call it "workgroup" and it can be shared with as many colleagues and team members as you want.

Jobin.cloud has so many features that we need to divide them into 2 categories

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

LinkedIn Automation:

With the press of a single button instantly import not just name and role, but the entire profile with emails, skills, experiences and all the rest, into your Jobin.cloud aggregated repository.

üöÄ Automate your LinkedIn Import
‚Ä¢ Import any Profile in FULL with one click
‚Ä¢ Import LinkedIn search results in bulk
‚Ä¢ Import Group Members in bulk
‚Ä¢ Import Event attendees in bulk
‚Ä¢ Import Post Participants in bulk
‚Ä¢ Google X-ray search
‚Ä¢ Auto import all your 1st connections in one click
‚Ä¢ Auto import all messages exchanged with your connections.

üí¨ Automate your LinkedIn Outreach
‚Ä¢ Bulk Emailing, Messaging and inMails
‚Ä¢ Custom messaging templates
‚Ä¢ Smart fields that adapt to each profile
‚Ä¢ Bulk personalized Connection requests with automated follow-ups
‚Ä¢ Bulk withdraw invitations

üîì Avoid LinkedIn restrictions
‚Ä¢ Bypass 100/week LinkedIn connection requests limits
‚Ä¢ Evade LinkedIn contact view limiters

Export your data to .CSV file

üìä Marketing efforts made simple
Evaluate your LinkedIn performance on Jobin
Jobin.cloud lets you observe various important metrics including the number of profile views & search appearances, your social selling index and evaluations of your campaign's performance.

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

ATS and CRM features:

What good is importing and messaging people in bulk if you keep contacting the wrong people or lose track of your passed conversations

üéØ Contact the right people
‚Ä¢ Advanced candidate ranking systems
‚Ä¢ Additional filtering, tagging and custom notes
‚Ä¢ Geographic searches with postcode, regions, distance, etc.
‚Ä¢ Contact method and connection level filters
‚Ä¢ Fully customizable pipeline

‚úÖ Data kept clean
‚Ä¢ Automatic profile updating
‚Ä¢ Automated data de-duplication
‚Ä¢ Automated data cleaning and merging

‚ö° Lightning fast .CSV file data migration in just 5 minutes
Thanks to Jobin.cloud's automatic profile updating, if your imported contacts also happen to have LinkedIn URLs you can fully update them with all their available data as well

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

üîé Sourcing and Enrichment features:

It doesn't stop at just LinkedIn information, Jobin.cloud comes with an integrated contact enrichment, enrich your contacts with data from all over the web:

‚Ä¢ Reach over 900M emails
‚Ä¢ Get 5 free enrichment credits a month forever
‚Ä¢ Automated and bulk enrichment in one click
‚Ä¢ Distinguish between personal and work emails
‚Ä¢ Phone numbers, social media profiles and more
‚Ä¢ Bulk personalizable emails campaign outreach


Additional information together will illustratory videos can be found on our features page

extensionTitle: WhenX: Mark Linkedin Profiles with notes
overview:
OverviewCandidate notes for Linkedin profiles. Synchronized with Google Search. Shared with your team.WhenX helps you to find previously visited links in your Google‚Ñ¢ search results by adding a tag with your last visit time next to the link! No need to go searching through your history or open up countless links in search of the correct one. Hovering over the tag will give you a more detailed stamp with specifics of the date and time of your last visit.

It helps you re-find webpages you visited before and gives you a time context about when you searched for certain topics. 


FEATURES
üîç Re-find websites
Instead of bookmarking every page you might need in the future, timestamps help you identify webpages you have seen before, when you search for them.

üö´ Avoid irrelevant links
A timestamp with a recent date like 'yesterday' or '8 hours ago' helps you avoid opening pages you recently explored, hence saves time reopening them.

‚èÆÔ∏è Retrospective
Timestamps appear for links visited before installation.

üîí Keeps your privacy
WhenX uses your local browser history, locally. Your history is not sent to any server and doesn't leave your local machine.


RATE US
‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Genuinely enjoying WhenX? Helped you save time at work? 
Support WhenX by giving us a great review on Chrome Store!

We are keen on your feedback! Feel free to leave your feedback or feature requests in a support ticket or tweet @whenxtensionSee more

it totally changed what it used to do. before it would tell you when you have visited each google search link. now it is doing something completely different and focuses on LinkedIn.

(Free users are limited to only 10 google searches with timestamps per day)

the " Web Notes" function is not  compatible with the Edge

overview:
OverviewLinkedIn Tag Checker assists website owners in confirming the accurate installation of the LinkedIn tags on their website.This tool is designed to assist users in verifying the installation and functionality of the LinkedIn Insight Tags on their websites. The extension checks for the presence of the Insight Tag, helps troubleshoot issues related to the tag, and provides real-time analytics data to help users optimize their LinkedIn campaigns. The LinkedIn Insight Tag Helper is a useful tool for advertisers and marketers who use LinkedIn's advertising platform to track website activity and campaign performance. 

Key Features:  

>>Tag presence verification - The tool checks if the LinkedIn Insight Tag is installed correctly on your website. 
 >>Easy troubleshooting - It helps troubleshoot common issues related to the Insight Tag, making it easy to identify and fix problems. 
>>User-friendly interface - The LinkedIn Insight Tag Helper has a user-friendly interface that makes it easy to use and understand. 
>>Simple setup process - The setup process is straightforward, and the tool can be installed in just a few clicks. 

What Is LinkedIn Insight Tags?  

The LinkedIn Insight Tag is a small snippet of JavaScript code that can be easily incorporated into your website, enabling you to gain comprehensive campaign reporting and access valuable information about your website visitors. With the Insight Tag, you can keep track of conversions, retarget your website visitors, and obtain further insights into how users engage with your ads. 


FAQs 

>> 1. How does the LinkedIn Tag Helper benefit advertisers and marketers?  

The Insight Tag Helper provides valuable insights and analytics data that help advertisers and marketers optimize their LinkedIn campaigns.  

>> 2. Can it be used with any website?  

The Insight Tag Helper is designed to be used with websites that have the LinkedIn Insight Tag installed. If the Insight Tag is not installed on your website, you will not be able to use the tool. 

>> 3. Is this a free tool?  

Yes, the LinkedIn Tag checker is a completely free tool.See more

OverviewBulk send LinkedIn invitation & LinkedIn message & LinkedIn inMails. Accelerate your B2B lead generation.üòãIf you want to expand your LinkedIn network, find prospect on LinkedIn, promote your business on LinkedIn, and extract prospect contact information, NexusIn is the essential LinkedIn tool for you!


üòãNexusIn offers large-scale automation to send invitations and InMails to your 2nd and 3rd+ prospects, automate sending customized messages to your prospects, and accelerate your marketing and promotion efforts, freeing you from manual operations!


üòãAs a powerful tool for lead generation on LinkedIn, NexusIn also allows you to find prospect's email and phone numbers, and export detailed prospect information including but not limited to industry, location, work experience, company information, education background, contact information, and more.


üòÅüòÅüòÅAll of these features are completely free to use!üòÅüòÅüòÅ


üòãThere are no limits on daily invitations, messages, or InMails, and it supports unlimited LinkedIn accounts!


üòãSupports LinkedIn regular accounts, LinkedIn sales navigator accounts, LinkedIn recruiter accounts, and more.


Core Features Description:

üöÄ LinkedIn Auto connect & Auto InMails - Your LinkedIn network amplifier

Scrape your leads from LinkedIn search, sales navigator search, LinkedIn post commenters, LinkedIn group members, and more. And manage them with the concept of LinkedIn campaigns. With NexusIn, you can send LinkedIn connections and LinkedIn InMails to these leads in bulk, generate a large number of leads for you, and quickly expand your LinkedIn network.


üöÄ Bulk LinkedIn Message - Your LinkedIn Outreach

Promote your products, introduce your brand, and even recommend yourself to your leads at scale by bulk sending LinkedIn messages to your LinkedIn 1st connections. Let you establish contact with leads in the first time and speed up communication.


üöÄ Lead Management - Your Lead management expert

With the concept of a campaign, group your leads and keep a record of the follow-up process of each lead. At the same time, through professional methods, we can obtain further information from leads, including the lead‚Äôs contact information (email address and phone numbers, etc.). Step out of the LinkedIn concept and let you connect with your key leads in the most direct and fastest way! At the same time, break through the LinkedIn connection limit and not be limited to conventional lead generation methods. It‚Äôs a real B2B lead generation tool!


üöÄ Leads Import & Export - Lead migration artifact

Quickly import any file containing LinkedIn URLs by reading files or leads exported from third-party platforms such as Waalaxy, Octopus, Doux Soup, Careerflow, Email Finder, Engage AI, etc. Accelerate your lead generation with NexusIn. At the same time, it supports the export function, which can directly export detailed customer information (including professional experience, company, school, industry, email number, mobile phone number, etc.) to Excel/CSV for further use.


üì£ More features are waiting for you to discover.See more

overview:
OverviewAuto visit user profiles, Auto-add 2nd degree connections, and Auto-endorse with linkedroidWhat is Linkedroid - The LinkedIn‚Ñ¢ Helper?

Linkedroid - The LinkedIn‚Ñ¢ Helper is an automation tool which work with chrome browser to assist users to generate leads by auto visiting profiles, adding second degree connections with a personalised message, auto accepting/rejecting bulk pending request along with greeting message.

Linkedroid - The LinkedIn‚Ñ¢ Helper 
  - Auto visits profiles
  - Auto endorse your 1st degree connections.
  - Auto add 2nd degree connections
  - Auto connect to people who visited your profile along with a follow up message.
  - Visit more than 1000 Profile with linkedroid.

 - Profile hopper

overview:
OverviewHide the number of job applicants for roles on LinkedIn.Have you ever looked at a job on LinkedIn only to see that there were hundreds of applicants and become so discouraged that you didn't apply at all? The number of applicants listed for most jobs on LinkedIn is not accurate, yet there is no way to disable it. 

Download this extension to make your job search via LinkedIn a little less stressful and to feel empowered to apply to more open roles. 

You can view the source code here: www.github.com/garnetred/hide-linkedin-applicants. 

Love this extension? Consider making a donation: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/decemberthedeveloper.

overview:
OverviewThis extension lights up with a new notification count whenever you have new activity waiting for you at LinkedIn.Clicking on the extension's icon is also an easy way to take you directly to the LinkedIn website to view your new activity.

Privacy Policy: https://www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy

By installing this extension, you agree to LinkedIn's User Agreement at https://www.linkedin.com/legal/user-agreement

Please send any feedback to liextension-feedback@linkedin.com

overview:
OverviewWiza.co | Prospect, Verify, Reach OutFind real-time verified email addresses on LinkedIn for free.

Wiza‚Äôs free LinkedIn email finder allows you to view accurate work and personal email addresses in seconds while on LinkedIn profiles.

‚úî Find emails on LinkedIn profiles

Using the Wiza LinkedIn email finder, you‚Äôll be able to pull up real-time verified email addresses (both business and personal) on any LinkedIn profile that you view‚Äîin a matter of seconds.

‚úî Bulk export leads from LinkedIn Sales Navigator and LinkedIn Recruiter

Wiza‚Äôs LinkedIn email finder enables you to export your searches and saved lead lists in LinkedIn Sales Navigator with real-time verified email addresses (and phone numbers).

‚úî Save emails found on LinkedIn to lists and export to CSV

Download your saved lists and exports to CSV in a single click, including contact name, employer, job title, email addresses, phone numbers, and 30+ other data points.

‚úî Sync emails directly to your CRM and sales tools in one click

Connect Wiza to your CRM (HubSpot, Salesforce, and more) and then instantly sync contacts with email addresses to your platform with one click.

‚úî Our LinkedIn email finder is trusted by 50,000+ users including:

Sales teams to prospect and build pipeline
Founders to find their first and next customers
Agency owners to perform lead generation for clients
Marketers to reach out about collaboration and link builder
Recruiters to source candidates and acquire talent

Join Wiza today and get 25 free credits every month: https://wiza.co/auth/signup

We appreciate your support and please feel free to reach out to us with any questions or needs via our live website chat or at hello@wiza.comSee more

reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best LinkedIn prospecting chrome extension. The emails and phone numbers it gets are the most accurate and it's such a beautifully designed app and super easy to use. The free plan made this a no-brainer to get started when I just needed to find a few contacts, and then I immediately upgraded to the premium plan to get unlimited emails when it came time to do major outreach campaigns. I HIGHLY recommend it!
I've been using Wiza religiously for 2 months now and recommend it to anyone needing accurate emails. Easy to use, great product, and love how they continue to focus on quality features.

Absolute game-changing product for prospecting on LinkedIn. Email addresses (work and personal) are consistently the most accurate I've seen in having tested a handful of these types of tools. Great UI/UX and free monthly plan makes it a no-brainer.

I cant delete my account - so stay away waste of my time.
Hate when someone try to hide the delete - COME ON SHOW IT . dont hide it - NOW you force to write bad about your tools and my review will be here forever.
Useless, after login several times never worked.
I tried with my brother, and it creates the email based on his names and name company. Thanks good I checked the free trial.
Just what I'm looking for - need e-mail address and this program will supply
Fantastic extension! It has significantly streamlined my workflow by providing quick access to extensive contact information, saving me valuable time at work.
Great Product, has been a game-changer for acquiring contact info. The accuracy of contact info is exceptional and the UI is exceptional! üöÄ

Totally rubbish extension, it just randomly arrange the name with company and make it a fake email id, that look like genuine email. But that is wrong email.

Wiza has been a game changer for me/my team. The accuracy of contact info saves so much time & so many headaches. The extension makes it super easy to use through LinkedIn + its not clunky compared to some others I've used

I'm a HUGE fan of Wiza! I've been using this tool for 2+ years & have recommended them to a ton of my Sales colleagues. It makes prospecting a breeze - the email data is super accurate & I love the LinkedIn widget. I can snag someone's email with one click :)

The perfect example of form over function. It looks good but cannot perform even a single action. It's pretty useless. Don't waste money on junk like this, please. The 100 positive ratings are most likely from employees who work at Wiza.
Not Free Credit available

This tool is great. The customer support is unmatched, there's someone available 24/7 whenever I have an issue. By far the most accurate contact data that I've gotten from any tool. Best part is they only charge when they actually give you a valid piece of data.

However if your search has more than what your credit permits it will show you a warning that you should setup your billing. overview:
OverviewThe most powerful LinkedIn Automation tool for lead generation and recruitingHave you ever wanted an automation tool that doesn't just automate your recruiting process, but also imports new leads from more than just searches and lets you organize them all into a modern ATS and CRM?

What is Jobin.cloud:

Jobin.cloud is a SaaS platform catered to finding and contacting the right people with integrated automation, ATS, CRM and lead generation technologies for both your contacts and accounts; we call it "workgroup" and it can be shared with as many colleagues and team members as you want.

Jobin.cloud has so many features that we need to divide them into 2 categories

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

LinkedIn Automation:

With the press of a single button instantly import not just name and role, but the entire profile with emails, skills, experiences and all the rest, into your Jobin.cloud aggregated repository.

üöÄ Automate your LinkedIn Import
‚Ä¢ Import any Profile in FULL with one click
‚Ä¢ Import LinkedIn search results in bulk
‚Ä¢ Import Group Members in bulk
‚Ä¢ Import Event attendees in bulk
‚Ä¢ Import Post Participants in bulk
‚Ä¢ Google X-ray search
‚Ä¢ Auto import all your 1st connections in one click
‚Ä¢ Auto import all messages exchanged with your connections.

üí¨ Automate your LinkedIn Outreach
‚Ä¢ Bulk Emailing, Messaging and inMails
‚Ä¢ Custom messaging templates
‚Ä¢ Smart fields that adapt to each profile
‚Ä¢ Bulk personalized Connection requests with automated follow-ups
‚Ä¢ Bulk withdraw invitations

üîì Avoid LinkedIn restrictions
‚Ä¢ Bypass 100/week LinkedIn connection requests limits
‚Ä¢ Evade LinkedIn contact view limiters

Export your data to .CSV file

üìä Marketing efforts made simple
Evaluate your LinkedIn performance on Jobin
Jobin.cloud lets you observe various important metrics including the number of profile views & search appearances, your social selling index and evaluations of your campaign's performance.

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

ATS and CRM features:

What good is importing and messaging people in bulk if you keep contacting the wrong people or lose track of your passed conversations

üéØ Contact the right people
‚Ä¢ Advanced candidate ranking systems
‚Ä¢ Additional filtering, tagging and custom notes
‚Ä¢ Geographic searches with postcode, regions, distance, etc.
‚Ä¢ Contact method and connection level filters
‚Ä¢ Fully customizable pipeline

‚úÖ Data kept clean
‚Ä¢ Automatic profile updating
‚Ä¢ Automated data de-duplication
‚Ä¢ Automated data cleaning and merging

‚ö° Lightning fast .CSV file data migration in just 5 minutes
Thanks to Jobin.cloud's automatic profile updating, if your imported contacts also happen to have LinkedIn URLs you can fully update them with all their available data as well

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

üîé Sourcing and Enrichment features:

It doesn't stop at just LinkedIn information, Jobin.cloud comes with an integrated contact enrichment, enrich your contacts with data from all over the web:

‚Ä¢ Reach over 900M emails
‚Ä¢ Get 5 free enrichment credits a month forever

‚Ä¢ Phone numbers, social media profiles and more

extensionTitle: WhenX: Mark Linkedin Profiles with notes
overview:
OverviewCandidate notes for Linkedin profiles. Synchronized with Google Search. Shared with your team.WhenX helps you to find previously visited links in your Google‚Ñ¢ search results by adding a tag with your last visit time next to the link! No need to go searching through your history or open up countless links in search of the correct one. Hovering over the tag will give you a more detailed stamp with specifics of the date and time of your last visit.

It helps you re-find webpages you visited before and gives you a time context about when you searched for certain topics. 


FEATURES
üîç Re-find websites
Instead of bookmarking every page you might need in the future, timestamps help you identify webpages you have seen before, when you search for them.

üö´ Avoid irrelevant links
A timestamp with a recent date like 'yesterday' or '8 hours ago' helps you avoid opening pages you recently explored, hence saves time reopening them.

‚èÆÔ∏è Retrospective
Timestamps appear for links visited before installation.

üîí Keeps your privacy
WhenX uses your local browser history, locally. Your history is not sent to any server and doesn't leave your local machine.


RATE US
‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Genuinely enjoying WhenX? Helped you save time at work? 
Support WhenX by giving us a great review on Chrome Store!

We are keen on your feedback! Feel free to leave your feedback or feature requests in a support ticket or tweet @whenxtensionSee more

overview:
OverviewLinkedIn Tag Checker assists website owners in confirming the accurate installation of the LinkedIn tags on their website.This tool is designed to assist users in verifying the installation and functionality of the LinkedIn Insight Tags on their websites. The extension checks for the presence of the Insight Tag, helps troubleshoot issues related to the tag, and provides real-time analytics data to help users optimize their LinkedIn campaigns. The LinkedIn Insight Tag Helper is a useful tool for advertisers and marketers who use LinkedIn's advertising platform to track website activity and campaign performance. 

Key Features:  

>>Tag presence verification - The tool checks if the LinkedIn Insight Tag is installed correctly on your website. 
 >>Easy troubleshooting - It helps troubleshoot common issues related to the Insight Tag, making it easy to identify and fix problems. 
>>User-friendly interface - The LinkedIn Insight Tag Helper has a user-friendly interface that makes it easy to use and understand. 
>>Simple setup process - The setup process is straightforward, and the tool can be installed in just a few clicks. 

What Is LinkedIn Insight Tags?  

The LinkedIn Insight Tag is a small snippet of JavaScript code that can be easily incorporated into your website, enabling you to gain comprehensive campaign reporting and access valuable information about your website visitors. With the Insight Tag, you can keep track of conversions, retarget your website visitors, and obtain further insights into how users engage with your ads. 


FAQs 

>> 1. How does the LinkedIn Tag Helper benefit advertisers and marketers?  

The Insight Tag Helper provides valuable insights and analytics data that help advertisers and marketers optimize their LinkedIn campaigns.  

>> 2. Can it be used with any website?  

The Insight Tag Helper is designed to be used with websites that have the LinkedIn Insight Tag installed. If the Insight Tag is not installed on your website, you will not be able to use the tool. 

>> 3. Is this a free tool?  

Yes, the LinkedIn Tag checker is a completely free tool.See more

Accelerate your B2B lead generation.üòãIf you want to expand your LinkedIn network, find prospect on LinkedIn, promote your business on LinkedIn, and extract prospect contact information, NexusIn is the essential LinkedIn tool for you!


üòãNexusIn offers large-scale automation to send invitations and InMails to your 2nd and 3rd+ prospects, automate sending customized messages to your prospects, and accelerate your marketing and promotion efforts, freeing you from manual operations!


üòãAs a powerful tool for lead generation on LinkedIn, NexusIn also allows you to find prospect's email and phone numbers, and export detailed prospect information including but not limited to industry, location, work experience, company information, education background, contact information, and more.


üòÅüòÅüòÅAll of these features are completely free to use!üòÅüòÅüòÅ


üòãThere are no limits on daily invitations, messages, or InMails, and it supports unlimited LinkedIn accounts!


üòãSupports LinkedIn regular accounts, LinkedIn sales navigator accounts, LinkedIn recruiter accounts, and more.


Core Features Description:

üöÄ LinkedIn Auto connect & Auto InMails - Your LinkedIn network amplifier

Scrape your leads from LinkedIn search, sales navigator search, LinkedIn post commenters, LinkedIn group members, and more. And manage them with the concept of LinkedIn campaigns. With NexusIn, you can send LinkedIn connections and LinkedIn InMails to these leads in bulk, generate a large number of leads for you, and quickly expand your LinkedIn network.


üöÄ Bulk LinkedIn Message - Your LinkedIn Outreach

Promote your products, introduce your brand, and even recommend yourself to your leads at scale by bulk sending LinkedIn messages to your LinkedIn 1st connections. Let you establish contact with leads in the first time and speed up communication.


üöÄ Lead Management - Your Lead management expert

With the concept of a campaign, group your leads and keep a record of the follow-up process of each lead. At the same time, through professional methods, we can obtain further information from leads, including the lead‚Äôs contact information (email address and phone numbers, etc.). Step out of the LinkedIn concept and let you connect with your key leads in the most direct and fastest way! At the same time, break through the LinkedIn connection limit and not be limited to conventional lead generation methods. It‚Äôs a real B2B lead generation tool!


üöÄ Leads Import & Export - Lead migration artifact

Quickly import any file containing LinkedIn URLs by reading files or leads exported from third-party platforms such as Waalaxy, Octopus, Doux Soup, Careerflow, Email Finder, Engage AI, etc. Accelerate your lead generation with NexusIn. At the same time, it supports the export function, which can directly export detailed customer information (including professional experience, company, school, industry, email number, mobile phone number, etc.) to Excel/CSV for further use.


üì£ More features are waiting for you to discover.See more

overview:
OverviewAuto visit user profiles, Auto-add 2nd degree connections, and Auto-endorse with linkedroidWhat is Linkedroid - The LinkedIn‚Ñ¢ Helper?

Linkedroid - The LinkedIn‚Ñ¢ Helper is an automation tool which work with chrome browser to assist users to generate leads by auto visiting profiles, adding second degree connections with a personalised message, auto accepting/rejecting bulk pending request along with greeting message.

Linkedroid - The LinkedIn‚Ñ¢ Helper 
  - Auto visits profiles
  - Auto endorse your 1st degree connections.
  - Auto add 2nd degree connections
  - Auto connect to people who visited your profile along with a follow up message.
  - Visit more than 1000 Profile with linkedroid.

overview:
OverviewHide the number of job applicants for roles on LinkedIn.Have you ever looked at a job on LinkedIn only to see that there were hundreds of applicants and become so discouraged that you didn't apply at all? The number of applicants listed for most jobs on LinkedIn is not accurate, yet there is no way to disable it. 

Download this extension to make your job search via LinkedIn a little less stressful and to feel empowered to apply to more open roles. 

You can view the source code here: www.github.com/garnetred/hide-linkedin-applicants. 

Love this extension? Consider making a donation: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/decemberthedeveloper.

overview:
OverviewMinimal Theme for LinkedInRemove LinkedIn clutter in one-click. Cut out distractions and focus on what brings you value.

Minimal Theme for LinkedIn is a Chrome extension that allows you to clean up the LinkedIn user interface. It allows customizations such as:
- Hide ads
- Simplify navigation menu
- Hide left and right panes if not useful
- Hide the messaging windows
- Streamline LinkedIn experience so you can focus on important features.

Minimal Theme for LinkedIn is a free app made by indie makers, and is not associated with LinkedIn Corporation.See more

reviews.reviewText: Absolutely fantastic, love it!

overview:
OverviewHide distractions on Linkedin‚Ñ¢ when you need to focus.This extension hides potential distractions on LinkedIn‚Ñ¢, including the newsfeed, suggested news, ads, and suggested people to follow. This lets you get in, get out, and get it done. 

This extension is free and opensource. It is is not affiliated with or produced by LinkedIn‚Ñ¢. I've gotten a lot of value from LinkedIn‚Ñ¢ in the past, and hope this extension will help you use it even more effectively. 

View the code on github:
https://github.com/mthurmond/distraction-free-for-linkedin

--> Try my other two extensions to remove distractions. Both are free & open source: 
- Hide My Email for Gmail‚Ñ¢:  https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/gmail-inbox-hider/koobmglbcddgeoopgphanmhjppfaehaa?hl=en&authuser=0

- Slack Hider:  https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/slack-hider/ojfkenmmieminleikclgocedgpggeecp?hl=en&authuser=0See more

reviews.reviewText: I've been using DF YouTube for a while and was looking for something similar for LinkedIn, specifically for the connections tab. Works great for Jobs tab. Doesn't work for "My network" as mentioned by Matt below (for now).

Thank you. Some of the feed contents are so annoying that you want to delete your account. This way I don't have to see what I don't like as the feedback also falls on deaf ears.
Works great!
The cleaner workspace (and mind space) that I didn't even know I needed. Very easy to use and helps me avoid being bombarded with distracting LinkedIn images/content.
Simple, intuitive, helps me concentrate on the most important tasks on linkedin
Work as expected :)

overview:
OverviewLinkedin AI assistant, assists in writing captivating posts, personalised comments and connect notesConnect Genie - Your Ultimate AI Assistant for LinkedIn engagement.

Leveraging OpenAI & ChatGPT, ConnectGenie assists you in:

- Write Captivating LinkedIn Posts on topics of your choice.
 - This feature provides several configurations which you can use to write your LinkedIn Post 
   according to your voice:
  - You can either use set of pre default topic themes to write a post or create your own topic.
  - You can enable "Hook & Meat" configuration to write a post which has an engaging Hook, 
     which will make your audience click on that "See More" button.
  - Choose a language of your choice to write the LinkedIn Post in your preferred language.
  - Get your LinkedIn Post already formatted in broetry style, this is a special formate popular 
    LinkedIn influencers use to make their Post look minimalistic and grab reader's attention. 
  - You can even write content with ConnectGenie for the other's LinkedIn Posts that you are resharing.

- Crafting thoughtful comments, relevant to Linkedin posts that spark meaningful conversations and, YOU engage like a PRO!!.

- Writing personalised connect notes which are based on your prospect's :
   - Profile details or
   - Their most recent posts.
 Thus adding a higher level of personalisation, which significantly increase your chances of getting the connect request accepted.

- Highlighting Linkedin posts based on keywords that are relevant to your niche, which lets you:
  - Focus your engagement efforts where they truly belong.
  - Consume content efficiently.

- Write Job Cover Letters that match Job description according to your profile:
 - You can have multiple Job Profiles.
 - You can import your LinkedIn Profile or You can Upload a Resume.
 - With a single click Craft a Job Cover Letter, which is a unique proposal and will make your recruiters want to hire you.

- It comes with pre packaged Tone Prompts which you can utilise to generate comments with a single click, but wait you are not restricted: You can even add your own custom tone prompts to fashion comments according to your style.

- Use Following GPT Models:
 - GPT-4
 - GPT-4o (GPT 4 Omni)
 - GPT-3.5-turbo
to make the content as per your choice.

- Use the Referral Program to earn free 20 % connects.

Use different settings to control :
- What keywords you would like to include / exclude in your Linkedin Content.
- Choose word length.
- Add hashtags in your comments.
- See the sample prompts yourself and customise them to become the engagement King.

You get 50 free credits on signup and 25 free credits every month. 

So What are you waiting for? Use Connect Genie to build your personal brand you always wanted. 

Why you should use this tool for commenting?
Simple answer: Effortless Comment Generation

See, Every Linkedin Guru / Coach would instruct us to increase our engagement on Linkedin by commenting but, we mostly come up with comments like "Thanks for Sharing", "Well Said" or in some cases "Great". Do you think these comments actually add value for the readers? They dont! We need to come up with better comments and I know it's not always easy, it can take time. With Connect Genie Comment generation feature:
- You will have an insightful comment ready in a matter of seconds.
- You can engage with more prospects in less time.
- Increase Linkedin profile visibility.
- You ensure your voice is heard.

Why you should use this tool for personalised connect notes?

Answer this:
Would you not appreciate, if someone really puts in an effort to investigate your profile before they sent you a connect note? You would right.
That is because those efforts show the requester is genuinely interested in connecting with you. Same goes for your prospects.

But investigating each prospect's profile can take a lot of time, you would have to manually go through all the data points, now imagine if you had to do this everyday for 100s of prospects, Wow that is a lot time and efforts. 

With connect genie, a personalised connect request note gets generated in a blink of an eye that too with a single click. Our AI system analyses crucial details from your target's LinkedIn profile and generates a personalised connect note which captures attention, sparks meaningful conversation, and build genuine relationships effortlessly. 

-Tailor Your Networking Experience

Connect Genie puts you in control with its AI assistant capabilities. Customise your prompts and settings to align with your networking goals. Select keywords to include or exclude, set word limits, and even enable hashtags to maximise your comment's reach. Watch your engagement soar as Connect Genie, helps you leave your mark on LinkedIn's vibrant professional community.

- Unleash Your LinkedIn Potential by joining Connect Genie's online community on Facebook, where professionals share tips for brand building, content generation, engagement and you also get free give aways.

Note: Connect Genie offers free and premium plans, ensuring a flexible and tailored experience that suites you. Upgrade to unleash the full power of our AI-driven features.

Remember, great opportunities await those who connect strategically. Let Connect Genie, be your guide in the world of networking.

Install Connect Genie, today and let the magic begin!See more

reviews.reviewText: This is way too good. Just the thing I needed to pace up my LinkedIn game.
Great extension. Definitely helps LinkedIn creators alot.

As a recruiter, Connect Genie has revolutionized my LinkedIn engagement strategy! With its AI-powered assistance, crafting personalized comments and connection notes tailored to each prospect's profile or recent activity is effortless. The tool's ability to highlight posts relevant to my niche streamlines content consumption, allowing me to focus my efforts where they matter most.

Connect Genie has transformed my LinkedIn game! The personalized connect request notes it whips up with a single click are like my secret weapon. Thanks to its AI, my networking now starts with attention-grabbing notes that spark genuine conversations effortlessly. It's like having a personal networking assistant right at my fingertips.
This extension is absolutely amazing and so helpfull. i loved it. it makes my task easy.
This Chrome extension has transformed my LinkedIn game. Its exponential growth in enhancing personal branding is remarkable. Highly recommended for professionals looking to make a lasting impact.

Really love this app idea. I got my linkedin account hacked and lost all the connections and data. So apparently I had to create a linkedin account from scratch. The number one thing that I had to fix in the new account was the number of connections. This is where thi app came in very handy. The customized message on connection request really improves your connection acceptance ratio. There are other amazing features as well in the app. Go use this app to UP your Linkedin game.
Good work..

This extension is a real genie for LinkedIn engagement. In a matter of seconds I can generate a post comment or a connection note then simply proof read it and press send. I am actually enjoying writing on LinkedIn now. Looking forward to more exciting features!

This AI Chrome extension is a game-changer for LinkedIn engagement. It generates personalized and contextually relevant comments with a human touch. Boosting connections and saving time, it's a must-have for all serious LinkedIn users. Seamless integration and ethical practices make it a top-notch networking tool!
Great tool, very user friendly. The prompts are really helpful to create meaningful connections.
Great Idea!! With its user-friendly interface, it empowers users to effortlessly create and expand networks, making complex networking tasks a breeze.

I think this is definitely one of the most productive and professional uses of AI. Opportunity tapped at the right time and very brilliantly so. I have used it only for a few hours and have already done most amount of engagement on Linkedin than I probably ever did in months previously.
This tool has saved me a lot of my time and my profile visibility boosted, I am able to connect with other LinkedIn peers more effectively.
Really awesome extension, easy to use and straight forward. It can you save a lot of time and can help you in your professional career.

I am incredibly impressed with this new AI app. The user interface is intuitive & user-friendly, making it easy for anyone to navigate and make the most of the app's features. I am excited to see how 
ConnectGenie continues to evolve & make a positive impact !!.
Excellent time-saver and works very well.
Brilliant extension! Saves a lot of time with excellent interface!

Thoroughly enjoyed using Connectgenie. Previously, I would often spend a significant amount of time thinking about what to write when leaving comments. However, this app has greatly simplified the process for me. It has made commenting a truly enjoyable and effortless experience!
Brilliant idea and it saves a lot of time. Before this I was going through the profiles and trying to collect data manually. Now with this extension it is just a click away!
Really loved this idea. Easy to understand interface and the user experience has been very seamless. Would love to see this for other platforms as well

overview:
OverviewYour professional relationships' CRM built for teams & creators.Unlock the full potential of your Professional Network with LeadDelta CRM.

Your professional relationships' CRM built for sales pros, recruiters, digital creators, marketers, and CEOs. LeadDelta is managing business connections for over 20,000 professionals.

In a nutshell, LeadDelta helps you become proactive about your most valuable asset ‚Äì your relationships.

üóÇÔ∏è Centralize all your professional contacts in a lightweight CRM
üì• Organize your messy Inbox and never miss opportunities
‚¨áÔ∏è Export and bulk remove your connections
üè∑ Filter, sort & tag (label), your connections
üóù Unlock data & signals from your network
üìß Send personalized messages at scale
‚úÖ Create Tasks & Reminders
ü§ù Collaborate with your team
‚ö°Ô∏è Build workflows

No distractions. No ads.

Why choose LeadDelta? 

Here‚Äôs our story...

LeadDelta was founded in Toronto üçÅ Canada in 2020. Since then... 
üéâ We shipped over 300 features & updates
üéâ Have 15,000+ satisfied users
üéâ Have an average rating of 4.9 out of 5
üéâ Awarded #1 SaaS of 2022 by Product Hunt

LeadDelta‚Äôs key features at a glance:

‚ûº Connections Manager
‚Ä¢ Beautifully designed, CRM view of your entire professional network
‚Ä¢ Create & manage custom tags (labels), and assign them to connections
‚Ä¢ Filter groups of people that match your criteria with 15+ data points
‚Ä¢ New data points: # of followers, last messaged, languages, birth dates and more...
‚Ä¢ Apply custom notes with 1 click... 

‚ûº LeadDelta Sidebar
‚Ä¢ Apply Tags and Notes while researching connections
‚Ä¢ Get important information about connections while on their LinkedIn profile
‚Ä¢ Go beyond your network and import connections into LeadDelta
‚Ä¢ Manage connections outside of your network with Tags, Notes, and Filters
‚Ä¢ View company employees at a glance while on company pages
‚Ä¢ Utilize LeadDelta filters in your search to find exactly who you‚Äôre looking for

‚ûº LeadDelta Inbox
‚Ä¢ List your most important social conversations without ads and distractions
‚Ä¢ Sidebar with notes/tags and important intel about a connection
‚Ä¢ Apply and filter tags to focus only on relevant conversations
‚Ä¢ Pin/Unpin üìå and Star ‚≠ê your most important conversations
‚Ä¢ Create/Save/Reuse message templates

‚ûº + More
‚Ä¢ Group follow & unfollow: clean up your feeds
‚Ä¢ 1-Click data export of filtered connection data into a. CSV file
‚Ä¢ Integrations: Zapier, HubSpot, LinkedIn, OpenAI

üöÄ NEW: LeadDelta AI Prospector + LeadDelta AI Sparkle
‚Äì Expand your network with AI-generated contact lists
‚Äì Connect with people outside your networking circle
‚Äì Your personal AI writer, translator, and spellchecker
‚Äì Create messages that resonate with your tone
‚Äì Become the Shakespeare of DMs

üöÄ NEW: LeadDelta Workspaces
‚Äì Centralize your entire team‚Äôs network
‚Äì Collaborate, search, take notes, and grow together
‚Äì Manage your team‚Äôs tasks and output

üöÄ NEW: LeadDelta CSV Import
‚Äì Centralize your network no matter the platform
‚Äì Enhance your contacts with custom data
‚Äì Manage your sales, marketing, and recruiting leads

üöÄ NEW: LeadDelta Tasks & Reminders
‚Äì A dedicated to-do list for your networking activities
‚Äì Create tasks linked to your contacts
‚Äì Get regular reminders to follow up

üöÄ NEW: LeadDelta HubSpot Integration
‚Äì Integrate contacts into your sales workflow
‚Äì Import contact data into HubSpot with a click
‚Äì Start workflows and campaigns through LeadDelta

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

üìçIf you need help by email, just forward it to us at support@leaddelta.com.
üìçWant more networking tips? Follow us on X (Twitter): @LeadDeltaHQ
üìçVisit: www.leaddelta.comSee more

reviews.reviewText: Great product helping me get my LI contacts in much better shape. Tools that arguably should be part of LinkedIn!
Demo is worthless. Find something with a real demo. I am not paying a year subscription to bulk delete, you need a better tiered pricing strategy. asinine

So excited to start using LeadDelta.

I had a small problem (MY FAULT, Not theirs) at the start and support were amazing in set up.
Onboarding intro video is fab and is really clear about where everything is and pretty amazed at the resources and what lead delta can actually do
Really happy with things.
Great, it helped me delete connections in a bulk.

Yeah, so here's a little feedback regarding support services. I had an issue, which I raised with support. They got back to me and somehow, from their end, managed to resolve the problem I was experiencing. Quick, courteous, curious, effective. I'm wowwed. Michael in Beijing

I really needed to remove large portion of my connections on LinkedIn. The best solution that helped me to this was lead delta. Managed to do this quickly and effectively and I plan on using some other of it's functionalities as well. Great tool.

As someone who has a large number of connections on LinkedIn, it was virtually impossible to properly use my network and find the exact set of people to reach out to for various activities. LeadDelta is the only tool I know of that helps me easily mine and engage with my network. Highly recommended.

The LinkedIn DM box is aweful if you have many conversations going on. LeadDelta solves that perfectly. It also opens up the road to integrations with other tools and automations you might want to have. If you take social selling seriously, this tools needs to be in your tool kit.

I found the product to do exactly what I needed/wanted.  Also, there was one operation I was seeking to which the team said they are working on.  It's very simple and direct in terms of the interface and a seamless integration w/ my LinkedIn profile. Highly recommend.  

Oh yeah, and excellent support when needed!
Excellent tool to manage, monitor and work with your 1st degree connections. The team are responsive and are developing the product to meet new requirements suggested by users. No downsides.

Love the app, makes team collaboration easier as well as communication with the customer.

Extremely happy to see such  a detailed but user friendly extension! It's so easy to navigate, that you'll learn your way around it in 10 minutes tops. Tags and notes alone helped me prioritize my connections.  Believe me, LeadDelta is the tool you never knew you needed it until you got it!

Lead Delta is its data integration. You can easily update and export your contacts‚Äô LinkedIn data to enrich your CRM. This helps you make informed decisions and grow your business. Lead Delta also has native Zapier integrations, so you can easily build workflows.

Another great thing about Lead Delta is that it‚Äôs ad-free and distraction-free. You can focus on networking without being interrupted by ads or notifications. It‚Äôs a clean and streamlined workspace for LinkedIn.
Excellent tool to get you to organize everything you need! I wish I had something like this from the very beginning. LeadDelta is a game changer for me.

Super easy to use, makes keeping track of my leads and connections simple and fast.  Moreover, it does not violate any of the terms of service on Linkedin, so no risk on that front.



What I like about LeadDelta is a great sync with  LinkedIn, absolutely no hiccup or problem of any kind! Then of course the possibility to add tags, notes, the search function are absolute lifesavers!
Love how this tool helps me organize my contacts and get the most out of LinkedIn. If you are in sales or recruitment, it will make your life a lot easier.
LeadDelta is a must-have tool for professionals seeking networking optimization. Highly recommended!

LeadDelta is a game-changing chrome extension for LinkedIn. Its seamless integration, user-friendly interface, and advanced network management capabilities make it indispensable for professionals looking to optimize their networking. With personalized messaging, smart tagging, and valuable analytics, LeadDelta takes your LinkedIn experience to new heights. Highly recommended!

Ok where do I start! Perhaps I can just say that I would never want to do LinkedIn without LeadDelta. Don't believe me? Give it a try, then comment your thoughts under this review!

For LinkedIn Pro networkers down to novice LinkedIn users, we all need LeadDelta. Trust me. This beautifully designed app is what will turn your LinkedIn account into a customer and prospecting machine! By the way, the team is is always listening and releasing valuable new features.

The product you offer is hands down some of the best work out there! I have been using it in my job search to help me keep track of recruiters and other contacts in my profession. It has been extremally helpful in finding leads on job opportunities.

I didn't know you couldn't bulk delete more than 25 connections at time, so I asked for a refund and was immediatly refunded. That means something of this company. Thank you.

The LeadDelta team read my mind by building this sleek CRM for LinkedIn. Love how it gives me a new way to keep in touch and sort my connections with a cleaner inbox, tags, notes, filtering, and dashboard with connection analytics. If you work in sales, marketing, or HR and use LinkedIn daily, it's a game-changer!
When I started using this, it increased the efficiency of my linkedin messaging, tagging messages, and there are constant improvements. It's the best CRM for linkedin I've used.

LeadDelta is my go-to place for any direct communication on Linkedin. I'm using it daily, saving me a lot of time and effort. When I say a lot, I mean something that took me an hour, not takes me 5 minutes! 

My favorite feature is tagging, where I can add a tag to each person and later filter them. Also, notes are super important to me. I never forget who the person is, what they care about, and how we know each other.

extensionTitle: Tappy - Your AI LinkedIn Comments Assistant
overview:
OverviewGrow your personal brand on LinkedInTappy is your AI LinkedIn Comments assistant, trained to generate a reply to LinkedIn posts in one tap using a variety of styles - thoughtful comments, insightful questions, language to spark disagreements, and many others.

Most generative AI text lacks personality. Tappy is trained to respond in a more casual and personal tone, so your AI comments feel more natural. Select from one of 3 voice templates to better match your voice on LinkedIn. 

Or train a custom and personalized AI model based on your recent LinkedIn comments to exactly match your own personal brand voice.

Tappy is a huge time-saver if you are growing your personal brand on LinkedIn, connecting with prospects during your sales process, or recruiting on LinkedIn.See more

reviews.reviewText: Saves me so much time. Quality of comments is actually amazing

Awesome product! One of the fastest ways to grow my LinkedIn brand is to comment on posts from larger accounts immediately after they are posted. With Tappy I can add comments to dozens of LinkedIn posts in minutes, it saves me so much time!

overview:
OverviewImport LinkedIn contacts to Pipedrive in a click‚úî What is Linkport? 

Linkport is a free extension by Klenty that enables effortless LinkedIn prospecting with its seamless Pipedrive integration. With Linkport, you are enabled to import, enrich and reach out to unlimited prospects in a single click. 

Linkport has a seamless native integration with Klenty and 4 CRMs - Pipedrive, Zoho, Hubspot and Salesforce. 

‚úî What are the features of the tool? 

With Linkport, 

‚Ä¢ Eliminate manual copy-pasting of LinkedIn URLs and constant tab-switching. 
‚Ä¢ Effortlessly enrich email, phone and technographic data of prospects on the spot in a single click.
‚Ä¢ Import LinkedIn URLs and enriched data to Klenty and Pipedrive in a single click. 
‚Ä¢ Add prospects to any cadence in Klenty‚Äôs Sales Engagement Platform to strategically engage with them. 

‚úî What are the CRM Integration features? 

Linkport‚Äôs seamless integration with Pipedrive enables - 

‚Ä¢ Automatic Duplicate Detection - While importing prospects from LinkedIn, LinkPort can automatically detect contacts that already exist in Pipedrive and Klenty and does not allow you to create a duplicate record.
‚Ä¢ Field Mapping - While importing prospects from LinkedIn, Linkport accurately updates the right fields with the right information. Additionally, you can also map these to custom fields in your CRM. 
‚Ä¢ Compatible with Sales Navigator - You can connect LinkPort with your LinkedIn Sales Navigator and LinkedIn account and import contact data into Pipedrive in seconds.

‚úî What are the advantages of using Linkport? 

Linkport enables you to 

‚Ä¢ Amplify partial datasets 
‚Ä¢ Save admin work time 
‚Ä¢ Build high-quality lists 
‚Ä¢ Strategically engage with your prospects

‚úî Who can use Linkport? 

Linkport is the ideal tool for anyone who uses LinkedIn for prospecting. For example - A Sales development representative can use this tool to find prospects and quality lists. 

‚úî How does it work? 

‚Ä¢ Install
Download the LinkPort extension for Pipedrive.

‚Ä¢ Integrate
Activate LinkPort by integrating it with Klenty and Pipedrive. Map contact information from LinkedIn in seconds.

‚Ä¢ Enrich 
Enrich email, phone, technographic, and job title information on the spot directly from LinkedIn profiles in a single click. 

‚Ä¢ Import
Import unlimited contacts with 1-click. Automatically update Pipedrive and Klenty with all the accurate data. 

‚Ä¢ Outreach 
Choose to automatically add prospects to any cadence in Klenty, from within Klenty itself. 

For more information,
Website: https://linkport.klenty.com/
Contact: support@klenty.comSee more

reviews.reviewText:
Total PAIN to figure out how to log in - the login is apparently hidden somewhere, I'm searching everywhere to find it. 
 Klenty keeps getting in the way, and Klenty wants me to pay.  Linkport is supposed to be free. Once the extension is working, then it works fine with LinkedIn.  I don't like how it takes up the entire right sign of my monitor.  How hard can it be to make this tool more user friendly? Make it easy to log in, and a simple button on my screen.
Can't even create an account, app is not working
Can I retrieve the work email as well? It's currently extracting the personal emails.

Love this extension for LI and PD. However, the "Add to Pipedrive" button doesn't appear in the Sales Navigator view of a prospect so I have to click to the LinkedIn profile to add them from there. Is there any way to fix that to get the button to appear in SN? Thanks!

Saves time, works, but not perfectly. Usually I have to double click the "Add to Pipedrive". If someone has a certifications following their name (DDS, CPA, etc), I find that the name doesn't input properly and I have to change them manually.
Worth a try if you use LinkedIn and Pipedrive

The extension generally works (I have to click Add to Pipedrive twice sometimes) but a big concern is the permission to "Read your browsing history." That seems unnecessary and not used on the functionality. Ideally they would publish a new extension without asking for this permission.

Works great!! I'd like to see the custom fields on the create contact sidebar, that way I could fill those out immediately (eg. I've got a custom field "country", so I need to go to the newly created account and add this manually).
so far so good - but a bulk import of all connections would be awesome

extensionTitle: LinkOff - Filter and Customizer for LinkedIn‚Ñ¢
overview:
OverviewLinkOff cleans and customizes LinkedIn. It filters out the junk, leaving behind the posts and page elements that you want to see.Make your LinkedIn experience better, instantly! With fewer distractions and better filtered content your sales, lead generation and networking will be a smoother and more enjoyable experience.

No more seeing unwanted likes and comments by your connections. Block the feed or filter it using custom keywords and find the connections and posts you want more easily. Job seeking? Advanced job filtering coming soon. While you are waiting, clean up your inbox - it can do it!

Also available on Firefox. Coming soon to Opera and other browsers.

üöÄ Features
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Option to hide the whole feed
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Post filtering by content (polls, videos, promoted, shared, etc)
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Hide posts by companies or specific people
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Filter by custom keywords (politics, coronavirus, vaccination, Noah Jelich, whatever)
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Hide posts shown due to interactions (comments, reactions, followed by connections)
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Hide irrelevant old posts (older than an hour, day, week, month)

  ‚≠êÔ∏è Select messages for mass deletion (clean your inbox)
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Unfollow all connections (without them seeing it)
  ‚≠êÔ∏è MESSAGE FILTERS COMING SOON

  ‚≠êÔ∏è JOB FILTERING COMING SOON

  ‚≠êÔ∏è Block ads on LinkedIn (banners, and sidebar)
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Hide LinkedIn learning and course recommendations
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Hide community panel and follow recommendations
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Stop LinkedIn premium upsell pestering
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Dark mode for LinkedIn

  ‚≠êÔ∏è Fully configurable to suit your need!
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Completely FREE and with NO ADS

  ‚≠êÔ∏è Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è by Noah Jelich

üöÄ FAQ

   ‚≠êÔ∏è Are you going to make a Tampermonkey/Greasemonkey script?
Unfortunately, no. I do not have time to maintain any more code
   ‚≠êÔ∏è What about Vivaldi/Brave/Edge/Opera and other browsers?
The extension can be natively installed on all chromium browsers
   ‚≠êÔ∏è What about Safari and MacOs?
The store charges 100$ per year to post apps, which I cannot afford
   ‚≠êÔ∏è How can I use this on mobile?
Since neither Chrome or Firefox allow for extensions in mobile browsers, you need to install a chromium distribution that does. I recommend Kiwi Browser (if you have any issues, please report them, still testing mobile support)See more

Let Dux-Soup do the legwork, whilst you focus on converting your leads to sales.

3. Find your perfect LinkedIn audience

Early days for me with Dux-Soup but five stars for these two reasons:
1. The webinars with Giles are excellent. Down to earth simple and the guy really knows his stuff.

Great start from the Dux-Soup guys!

Not only is this an excellent service, but the customer service is 5-star quality, too. I've been using Dux-Soup on and off for a few years, and now to great effect communicating with my 1st degree relationships via LinkedIn. Really solid. And only getting better over time.

Early days for me with Dux-Soup but five stars for these two reasons:
1. The webinars with Giles are excellent. Down to earth simple and the guy really knows his stuff.

Great start from the Dux-Soup guys!

overview:
OverviewSafe and easy LinkedIn automation tool - automate LinkedIn connections and messages for lead generation, prospecting & salesüôåüèª  Get your first new targeted lead within the next 24 hours and scale it further in under 10 minutes a day.

Send LinkedIn connection requests and personalized message sequences automatically with a single click of a button. 

‚≠ê The easiest LinkedIn automation tool - don‚Äôt waste your time learning complicated software.

‚≠ê Undetectable by LinkedIn - the safest LinkedIn automation software thanks to the complete AI-based simulation of manual activity.

‚≠ê 1.3 million connection requests and messages sent every week using InTouch Tool.

üí∞ All the essential functionality of InTouch Tool is free forever!

HOW IT WORKS:

1. Set up your personalized connection request and message sequence - according to your custom schedule and rules.

2. Choose your target audience from standard LinkedIn search / LinkedIn Sales Navigator / your LinkedIn network or import them from your CSV file.

3. Press ‚ÄúStart‚Äù and watch getting replies!

Pro tip: InTouch Tool extracts emails and other personal data of your prospects, so you can reach them using other channels. Export LinkedIn profiles into your CRM or a CSV file.

Check out our website for demo videos and other information: https://intouchtool.com/


SAFETY:

ü§ñ Safety is #1 focus of InTouch Tool - it is designed for 100% simulation of human activity and can‚Äôt be detected by LinkedIn.

InTouch Tool clicks buttons on LinkedIn website in the same way as you do - unlike the cloud-based automation solutions, that put your LinkedIn account at risk.

Every action is scheduled using our smart AI-based algorithms and performed in your own browser which makes LinkedIn automation indistinguishable from manual activity.


FEATURES:

üîó LinkedIn auto connect.
‚ñ∏ Automate LinkedIn connection requests to expand your network easily. 
‚ñ∏ Personalize your automated LinkedIn invitations with {{first_name}}, {{last_name}}, {{company}}, and other personal data to achieve high connection rates in your lead generation and prospecting campaigns.
‚ñ∏ Include even more personalization with {{custom_snippet}} section in your invitations.
‚ñ∏ Automatically withdraw old connection requests that were not accepted.

üí¨ LinkedIn auto messages.
‚ñ∏ Automate LinkedIn messages and follow-ups to those who connected with you but haven't replied. 
‚ñ∏ Personalize your messages with {first_name}, {last_name}, {company}, and other personal data so that your prospects don‚Äôt feel any automation.
‚ñ∏ Set up a custom sending schedule for your messages by adding delays between the messages.
‚ñ∏ Make your message sequence flexible using the rules like ‚Äústop sending messages if the prospect replied‚Äù. 

üïµÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è LinkedIn scraper.
‚ñ∏ Automatically collect people from standard LinkedIn search / LinkedIn Sales Navigator / your LinkedIn network / your CSV file. 
‚ñ∏ Use LinkedIn filters and keywords to specify your target audience on LinkedIn. 
‚ñ∏ InTouch Tool will automate connecting to your target audience and mass messaging them.
‚ñ∏ Search, filter, and export the collections of your scraped LinkedIn profiles.
‚ñ∏ Make manual adjustments in the collections of LinkedIn profiles that you scraped. For example, adjust the name or other personal data before starting the outreach.

üìà LinkedIn lead generation dashboard.
‚ñ∏ Analyze the performance of your LinkedIn prospecting campaigns and adjust them to improve your sales funnel. 
‚ñ∏ Use dashboards to compare the connection and reply rate statistics of your prospecting campaigns and perform A/B tests.
‚ñ∏ Perform advanced analysis of your LinkedIn lead generation campaigns using the detailed CSV reports that include the date of connection, reply messages and much more.

ü§ñ LinkedIn email extractor.
‚ñ∏ Automatically scrape LinkedIn profiles of your target audience. 
‚ñ∏ Extract emails and other personal data of your target audience.
‚ñ∏ Export LinkedIn profiles into a CSV file or your CRM. 
‚ñ∏ Organize your LinkedIn inbox by connecting to more than 3000+ CRMs and applications including HubSpot, Salesforce, Pipedrive, Zoho, and Google Spreadsheet via Zapier.


WHO USES IT:

‚ñ∏ Startups and business owners for growth hacking and automated LinkedIn outreach.

‚ñ∏ Marketing and sales teams to automate lead generation and prospecting on LinkedIn.

‚ñ∏ Freelancers to find more clients interested in their services.

‚ñ∏ Recruiters to automate search for highly relevant candidates.

‚ñ∏ Virtual assistants and lead gen agencies for managing multiple LinkedIn profiles of their clients.

‚ñ∏ Individuals for various purposes, e.g. inviting people to an event, promoting a book, looking for a contractor, and more.


WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS SAY:

‚ÄúFrom my experience InTouch Tool is the simplest tool for LinkedIn outreach. I used to use bulky software like LinkedHelper and dux-soup and spent hours learning how to use them‚Ä¶ In Touch tool has exactly everything I need for LinkedIn lead generation‚Äù - Angela S. (Business Development Manager)

‚ÄúThe automation process looks just like it is performed by a real human and not a bot!‚Äù - Nadine Q. (HR Manager)

‚ÄúFinally I have a reliable source of new clients and can spend time focusing on my real work.‚Äù - Fred S. (Web Developer, Freelancer)


‚≠ê All the essential functionality of InTouch Tool is free forever!

InTouch Tool is the easiest and safest alternative to Prospectin, Octopus CRM, Meet Alfred, LinkedHelper, and Dux-Soup. Automate your LinedIn prospecting and lead generation with the InTouchTool LinkedIn bot and spend your time working only on the right prospects!

Check out our website for demo videos and other information: https://intouchtool.com/
Contact us: support@intouchtool.comSee more
